sqlMap.statement: SELECT d.ROW_ID d_ROW_ID,d.CREATED_BY d_CREATED_BY,d.MODULE_ID d_MODULE_ID, d.LABEL d_LABEL,d.VISIABLE d_VISIABLE,d.DISP_NO d_DISP_NO,d.STATUS d_STATUS, d.LAST_UPD_BY d_LAST_UPD_BY,d.ROLE_ID d_ROLE_ID,d.GROUP_ID d_GROUP_ID FROM SM_USER_DESK_PROGRAM d WHERE 1=1 AND d.GROUP_ID=#value# ORDER BY d.DISP_NO

SELECT d.ROW_ID d_ROW_ID,d.CREATED_BY d_CREATED_BY,d.MODULE_ID d_MODULE_ID,d.LABEL d_LABEL,d.VISIABLE d_VISIABLE,d.DISP_NO d_DISP_NO,d.STATUS d_STATUS,d.LAST_UPD_BY d_LAST_UPD_BY,d.ROLE_ID d_ROLE_ID,d.GROUP_ID d_GROUP_ID FROM SM_USER_DESK_PROGRAM d WHERE 1=1

SELECT d.ROW_ID d_ROW_ID,d.CREATED_BY d_CREATED_BY,d.MODULE_ID d_MODULE_ID,d.LABEL d_LABEL,d.VISIABLE d_VISIABLE,d.DISP_NO d_DISP_NO,d.STATUS d_STATUS,d.LAST_UPD_BY d_LAST_UPD_BY,d.ROLE_ID d_ROLE_ID,d.GROUP_ID d_GROUP_ID FROM SM_USER_DESK_PROGRAM d WHERE 1=1 AND d.ROW_ID=#value#

UPDATE SM_USER_DESK_PROGRAM SET LAST_UPD_TIME=CURRENT TIMESTAMP,CREATED_BY=#d_CREATED_BY#,MODULE_ID=#d_MODULE_ID#,LABEL=#d_LABEL#,VISIABLE=#d_VISIABLE#,DISP_NO=#d_DISP_NO#,STATUS=#d_STATUS#,LAST_UPD_BY=#d_LAST_UPD_BY#,ROLE_ID=#d_ROLE_ID#,GROUP_ID=#d_GROUP_ID# WHERE ROW_ID=#d_ROW_ID#

WITH RPL (ROW_ID, PROGRAM_CODE, PROGRAM_NAME, INNER_CODE, SUBSYSTEM_ID, DEFAULT_YN, MENU_NAME, FILE_NAME, PICTURE, TARGET, START_PROGRAM, LEAF_YN, LEVEL_NUM, PARENT_MODULE_ID, PROGRAM_DESC, USING_FLAG, VISIBLE_FLAG, TAXIS_NO, APPLICATION_ID ) AS
( SELECT ROOT.ROW_ID, ROOT.PROGRAM_CODE, ROOT.PROGRAM_NAME, ROOT.INNER_CODE,ROOT.SUBSYSTEM_ID, ROOT.DEFAULT_YN,ROOT.MENU_NAME,ROOT.FILE_NAME,ROOT.PICTURE,ROOT.TARGET, ROOT.START_PROGRAM,ROOT.LEAF_YN,ROOT.LEVEL_NUM,ROOT.PARENT_MODULE_ID,ROOT.PROGRAM_DESC, ROOT.USING_FLAG,ROOT.VISIBLE_FLAG,ROOT.TAXIS_NO,ROOT.APPLICATION_ID FROM SM_PROGRAM ROOT WHERE
ROOT.USING_FLAG = '0' AND ROOT.VISIBLE_FLAG = '0' AND ROOT.LEVEL_NUM >= -1 AND ROOT.LEVEL_NUM <= 10 AND ROOT.LEAF_YN='Y' AND ( ROOT.ROW_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT PROGRAM_ID FROM SM_ROLE_PROGRAM WHERE DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND ROLE_ID IN ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SM_USER_ROLE WHERE DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND USER_ID = #USER_ID# ) ) AND ROOT.ROW_ID NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT MODULE_ID FROM SM_USER_DESK_PROGRAM SP,SM_USER_DESK_GROUP SG WHERE SP.GROUP_ID=SG.ROW_ID AND SG.ROLE_ID=#USER_ID# )
)
ROOT.ROW_ID IN ($m_MODUL_ID$)
UNION ALL SELECT CHILD.ROW_ID, CHILD.PROGRAM_CODE, CHILD.PROGRAM_NAME, CHILD.INNER_CODE, CHILD.SUBSYSTEM_ID,CHILD.DEFAULT_YN,CHILD.MENU_NAME,CHILD.FILE_NAME,CHILD.PICTURE, CHILD.TARGET,CHILD.START_PROGRAM,CHILD.LEAF_YN,CHILD.LEVEL_NUM, CHILD.PARENT_MODULE_ID,CHILD.PROGRAM_DESC, CHILD.USING_FLAG,CHILD.VISIBLE_FLAG,CHILD.TAXIS_NO,CHILD.APPLICATION_ID FROM RPL PARENT, SM_PROGRAM CHILD WHERE PARENT.PARENT_MODULE_ID = CHILD.ROW_ID AND CHILD.USING_FLAG = '0' AND CHILD.VISIBLE_FLAG = '0' AND CHILD.LEVEL_NUM >= -1 AND CHILD.LEVEL_NUM <= 10 )
SELECT DISTINCT ROW_ID ID, PROGRAM_CODE PCODE, PROGRAM_NAME LABEL , START_PROGRAM, CASE WHEN LEAF_YN ='Y' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS LEAF , PARENT_MODULE_ID PARENTID, TAXIS_NO FROM RPL ORDER BY ROW_ID, PARENT_MODULE_ID , PROGRAM_NAME
